Name: Nike Arizona Wildcats Basketball Jersey
Description: Step up your game day style with this sleek Arizona Wildcats #1 basketball jersey! Designed in a bold navy with vibrant red and white accents, this jersey is perfect for showing off your Wildcat pride.
Feature: 100% authentic Nike product,Dri-FIT technology,Official NCAA licensed product,Machine washable

Name: UA Vintage Hoodie
Description: Comfortable vintage-style hoodie in beige with the University of Arizona logo. Featuring a graphic of the iconic Old Main Campus building at the back.

Name: UA Wildcats Cap
Description: Official University of Arizona cap in white. Embroidered Wildcat logo with a special tag 'Viva Los Gatos' a.k.a Long live Cats!

Name: UA Water Bottle
Description: Stay hydrated with this University of Arizona branded water bottle. Clear plastic and a navy blue cap - bring it your class, gym or anywhere!

Name: Wildcat Keychain
Description: Decorate your bag with this official University of Arizona keychain. A plushie of Wildcat with an Arizona attire, perfect as gifts for your loved ones.

Name: Arizona Wildcats T-Shirt
Description: Classic University of Arizona t-shirt in black with the arched graphics. Perfect for everyday, whether you are going to class or day-out.

Name: University of Arizona Coffee Mug
Description: Brew your morning coffee or tea with this official UA coffee mug. Available in navy-red colorway and a Wildcat mascot at the center.

Name: UA Cuffed Pom Beanie
Description: Stay warm while showing your Wildcat pride by wearing this official UA beanie. With red-navy color way and a cuffed pom at the top.
Feature: Soft knit fabric,Embroidered logo,One size fits most
